example.title: Referencing values from an earlier message
example.para: The following action can be used to log the length of an SSH session (the time difference between a login and a logout message in the context):
example.synopsis: <actions> <action> <message> <values> <value name="MESSAGE">An SSH session for ${SSH_USERNAME}@1 from ${SSH_CLIENT_ADDRESS}@2 closed. Session lasted from ${DATE}@2 ${DATE} </value> </values> </message> </action> </actions>
